New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 4 月 23 日星期二 22:10:17 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Treaty of Waitangi: Call for input from ‘variety of voices’ for revamped exhibition at Te Papa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/treaty-of-waitangi-call-for-input-from-variety-of-voices-for-revamped-exhibition-at-te-papa/K3CCZBC7RNFNHHRVNAH23VNFQE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/treaty-of-waitangi-call-for-input-from-variety-of-voices-for-revamped-exhibition-at-te-papa/K3CCZBC7RNFNHHRVNAH23VNFQE/ The museum will seek voices on next steps for damaged Treaty display. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 22:05:00 +0000 A temporary display will be on the wall until a decision is made about the Treaty of Waitangi display.
Search continues for missing fisherman who fell from his boat off Raglan coast, Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-continues-for-missing-fisherman-who-fell-from-his-boat-off-raglan-coast-waikato/5DIMD3DMWVAKTIPJEVKK6JAO4E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/search-continues-for-missing-fisherman-who-fell-from-his-boat-off-raglan-coast-waikato/5DIMD3DMWVAKTIPJEVKK6JAO4E/ Police said the man had been fishing alone before having a medical event. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 22:03:49 +0000 A search resumes for a man who went missing off the Raglan coast after he fell overboard and activated an emergency beacon.

Fiordland wapiti: Forest & Bird takes legal action over hunting agreement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fiordland-wapiti-forest-bird-takes-legal-action-over-hunting-agreement/FLTDWTNFNFADVHZQUQ2FKVW2TI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/fiordland-wapiti-forest-bird-takes-legal-action-over-hunting-agreement/FLTDWTNFNFADVHZQUQ2FKVW2TI/ Monique SteeleFiordland Wapiti Foundation says it has responsibly managed the herd for decades. Man with stomach cancer had surgery at Christchurch Hospital cancelled last minute ‘due to staff shortages’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-and-death-situation-man-with-cancer-had-surgery-cancelled-at-last-一分钟/EEFMGZE5DRAJHEMAGHZTYBAXI4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/life-and-death-situation-man-with-cancer-had-surgery-cancelled-at-last-一分钟/EEFMGZE5DRAJHEMAGHZTYBAXI4/ 'What are we living in? A Third World country?' Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:01:37 +0000 A patient was wearing a gown, ready for theatre when he was told his Christchurch Hospital operation had been cancelled.
Injured Napier City Rovers footballers open up on long road back to fitness https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gone-in-six-seconds-injured-footballers-open-up-on-long-road-back-to-fitness/U242VVNQDRDCBNYT3AU67PH7DY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/gone-in-six-seconds-injured-footballers-open-up-on-long-road-back-to-fitness/U242VVNQDRDCBNYT3AU67PH7DY/ Neil ReidA sportsman who suffered a horror knee injury six seconds into a match opens up. Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:00:00 +0000 Injured Napier City Rovers player and Central Districts cricketer Christian Leopard - pictured last year - is now able to return to jogging during his lengthy rehab back from a full knee reconstruction. Photo / Neil Reid
